pinyin: kan1 cai4 chi1 fan4 , liang2 ti3 cai2 yi1

definitions.kan1 cai4 chi1 fan4 , liang2 ti3 cai2 yi: eat depending on the dish, cut cloth according to the body (idiom); to fit the appetite to the dishes and the dress to the figure; to act according to actual circumstances; to live within one's means;
